thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: Tessa Pedersen
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Tessa Pedersen

author: Tessa Pedersen
title: Tessa Pedersen
text:
Trade Tested is very reliable and deal with when purchasing goods. Their website is easy to use and the goods (a potting workbench) was received within a couple of days from payment. The kitset was very easy to assemble and very good quality.
I highly recommend Trade Tested and the products that the sell.
